医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
智能手表数据可以提供评估心血管健康的新方法一项新的研究表明，对您的心脏健康的答案可能是在您的手腕上。根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC25）的一项研究，研究人员已经开发了一种根据智能手表通常收集的信息来评估心血管健康的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/smartwatch-data-data-could-offer-new-way-way-way-way-to-assess-cardiastiascular-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/smartwatch-data-data-could-offer-new-way-way-way-way-to-sassess-cardiastiastiastiastiastiastiastiastiashealth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f37b8244-d480-480-40-40-a98f-ff94d41cf33d Thu, 20 Mar 2025 14:18:06 -0400 Smartwatch data could offer new way to assess cardiovascular health
大肠癌患者面临心血管死亡的风险增加根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC.25）的一项研究，被诊断出患有大肠癌的人比一般人群更有可能死于心血管原因，尤其是在其癌症诊断和50岁以下的患者中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/colecorectal-cancer-patients-face-face-face-increard-increard-face-face-of-card-of-of-cardiescular-deph.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/colorectal-cancer-patients-patients-face-increased-risk-risk-risk-cardiascular of-cardiescular-Death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76B06F09-059A-46E-46E9-B9F2-6519DBC64307 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 14:17:17 -0400 Colorectal cancer patients face increased risk of cardiovascular death
乳房X线照片中的AI技术可以预测女性的心脏病根据美国心脏病学院年度科学学院（ACC25）的一项研究，在人工智能（AI）模型的帮助下，乳房X线照片可能比癌症揭示的要多得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/ai-technology-in-mammagramss-could-predict-predict-hernt-disease-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/ai-technology-in-mammogramss-could-predict-predict-hent-disease-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b546fb5-6957-41c1-9a0f-efacb80471d3 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 14:07:00 -0400 AI technology in mammograms could predict heart disease in women
卵形切除术与女性心力衰竭的较高风险有关根据美国心脏病学院的年度科学学院（ACC.25）的一项研究，在称为双侧卵巢切除术的手术中，育龄年龄的妇女在一种称为双侧卵巢切除术的手术中更有可能患上心力衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/oophorophorophoryctome-linked-to-higher-rink-risk-risk-failt-failure-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/Oophorectomy-linked-to-higher-risk-of-heart-failure-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0E42ED46-E76D-4002-9A4C-8421A5A0A425 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 14:00:34 -0400 Oophorectomy linked to higher risk of heart failure in women
细胞地图提供了PCOS女性子宫内膜功能障碍的见解多囊卵巢综合征（PCOS）的妇女发现怀孕更难，流产频率更高，并且患上子宫内膜癌的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/cell-map-ffers-insights-into-into-endometrial-dysfunction-in-women-women-women-with-pcos.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/cell-map-offers-insights-into-into-endometrial-dysfunction-in-women-women-women-with-pcos.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=770750d3-e884-449b-8ff7-2bfd7-2bfd513c8a73 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 13:54:27 -0400 Cell map offers insights into endometrial dysfunction in women with PCOS
医疗保健专业人员需要更好的支持才能识别T1DE根据萨里大学的新研究，医疗保健专业人员需要更好的支持，以帮助识别和治疗1型糖尿病患者的饮食失调症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/healthcare-professionals-need-better-better-better-support to-recognize-t1de.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/healthcare-professionals-need-better-better-support-support to-recognize-t1de.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcc9be25-b883-411d-b6cb-a9eb1fd83580 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 13:29:00 -0400 Healthcare professionals need better support to recognize T1DE

科学家发现不可逆转的肽抑制剂是​​不良癌症靶标的科学家首次确定有前途的候选药物，这些候选药物与臭名昭著的“不良”癌症蛋白靶标的不可逆转地结合，永久阻止了它。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/Scientists-discover-irrever-phible-pheptide-indibitors-for-for-undruggable-cancercer-cancer-target.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/scientists-discover-irrever-phip--------------for-undruggable Cancer-cancer-cancer-target.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89Dabd78-F973-429C-963B-A0B-A0B536C07DB7 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 07:46:30 -0400 Scientists discover irreversible peptide inhibitors for undruggable cancer target
AGA就AI辅助结肠镜检查技术提出了新建议美国胃肠病学协会（AGA）发布了一项新的临床指南，不建议在结肠镜检查中使用计算机辅助检测系统（CADE）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/aga-issues-new-recommendations-on-ai-sasissed-colonoscopy-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/aga-issues-new-recommendations-on-ai-sasisted-colonoscopy-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1B8B94A-CF7E-4083-BAAC-37CA211825AE Thu, 20 Mar 2025 07:36:06 -0400 AGA issues new recommendations on AI-assisted colonoscopy technology
智能手表数据提供了持续共同症状的关键见解在2020年4月至2022年12月之间，德国超过53.5万人下载并激活了Corona Data Donation App（CDA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/smartwatch-data-provides-key-ingeights-into-persistent-covid-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/smartwatch-data-provides-key-ineights-into-persistert-covid-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad5E2903-816E-40B9-9B9B9F-3814F7314A04 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 07:31:18 -0400 Smartwatch data provides key insights into persistent COVID symptoms
